questions.question: There is no ............................... in talking to him.
questions.description: The correct expression is no point in.

questions.question: The rain played havoc ............................... our plans.
questions.description: The correction expression is play havoc with.

questions.question: ............................. all I know, she is still in love with him.
I look forward .................................... you.
questions.description: The correct expression is look forward to + ing form.

questions.question: I told you ................................... me.
questions.description: We make the negative form of the infinitive by putting not before to.

questions.question: .................................. the time we reach there, the train will have left.
I can't believe how .................................. I am.
questions.description: When you are out of shape, you are in a very bad condition.

questions.question: I had to wash the clothes by hand because the washing machine was ....................................
questions.description: If a machine is out of order, it is not working.

questions.question: They burst ................................. tears after losing the championship.
We reached on time .................................... the rain.
questions.description: In spite of is a preposition. It is used before a noun.

questions.question: ................................. having a cold, I managed to enjoy the party.
questions.description: We use despite before a noun or an ing form.
